title: This Client.
body:
Like its so slow and I have done everything to bring the resolution to its lowest from disabling animations and bringing the screen size down. I don't own the best computer so this is just straight up stupid to deal with. Not to mention there's a few bugs with it. One of them is when you accept a que and it loads nothing making you dodge. How do I make this client faster?

If its not possible, how do I revert the update?

replies.body: Can you be more descriptive with the issues you are experiencing so I know what's going on? Specifically the parts around it *being slow* and *nothing loading* after accepting a match.

- Over all it's slow loading pages up.
- My cursor lags when I try to click on a tab.

For matches it literally nothing but my summoners after I accept a match.

Overall, these sound like common symptoms of an unstable connection to our servers. Most of the time, this is caused by specific network settings that conflict with League's ability to maintain a strong connection to the different services you access within the client. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.

Targons Blade

I been using the macbook for league of legends. The beta and alpha client window size was too big, but then it gave me a option to make it smaller. Then the client became too small and i can't adjust it back to the bigger client. I tried the instructions in other forums like crtl + or crtl - but I don't think that applies to the mac. Is there any solution? Thank you!
